Package.Name: Modular Frontend
Package.Description: A modular frontend example using Plasmic, Gatsby, Docusaurus and React. See how to use routing to seamlessly deploy different tech stacks on the one domain.

Full.Name: Modular Frontend
Full.Description: A modular frontend example using Plasmic, Gatsby, Docusaurus and React. See how to use routing to seamlessly deploy different tech stacks on the one domain.
